body.name: OFIKA Home Office Chair, 400LBS Big and Tall Chair Heavy Duty Design, Ergonomic High Back Cushion Lumbar Back Support, Computer Desk Chair, Adjustable Executive Leather Chair with Armrest
features: ✨【Upgrade High Back For Relieve Fatigue】- According to the upgrade ergonomic supporting cervical vertebrae design, our desk chair will reduce your back and vertebrae pain when you are long time working, segmented padded high back and seat with ultra cushioning give you extreme comfort experience,This ergonomic office chair is best choice of Periarthritis of shoulder.

✨【Safety Leather Executive Chair】- Leather office chair cradles your body with soft leather and a double padded foam seat cushion, 400 pound weight capacity, padded armrest for an upscale look and max comfort you can sink into it,this executive chair will improve your work efficiency, work and rest go together.

✨【Adjustable Height 】- This Chair height can be adjusted from 42.8inch to 46.6inch, you can adjust the height according to your needs. Our home office chair are flexible and suitable for your office environment. Chair can be tilted angle of 90 ° -110 °, can be rocking design can help you relax your back.

✨【Easy to Set up】 - Comes with all hardware & necessary tools, this computer desk chair is easy and quickly to assemble according to the instructions on the package, only 10-15 minutes required to complete the entire installation process.

✨ 【Excellent Customer Service】-If there is any problem with the office chair, please contact us directly.Our customer support team will respond within 24 hours! 100% satisfactory solution if any issue!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels good quality for the price and went together quickly.
reviews.reviewText: Received today and put together. The chair felt like it was a good quality for the price. Faux leather is thin, but that is part of buying an inexpensive chair. The chair felt comfortable and study. It was easy to put together. Wheels popped on. Four Allen screws for the seat bottom, eight Allen bolts to attach the arms, bottom, and seatback. I will update if it does not stand up to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for. Beware for sharp points in the armrests
reviews.reviewText: While this chair is good. After you've been using it for almost two years. The material will start to tear apart overtime. With this comes the first problem. The arm rests. As the material degrades. You'll find your elbows and arms being constantly poked by these fairly sharp metal spikes. Can be fixed if you wear a long sleeve shirt or put a blanket over the arm rests. Overall, the chair is alright. But I'd switch out for a better chair once your elbows and arms start getting poked by those sharp points in the arm rest. Support wise, it's alight, but might be a uncomfortable for taller people. It's comfortable enough you can sit in this chair for long periods, more than 5 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New office chairs again?
reviews.reviewText: Always good to have history. It's 2009. New computer desks, file cabinets and office chairs. Today August 2022, same computer desks and file cabinets for home office.We use the 5th bedroom as an office. In 2009 we purchased low end $99.00 each (foolisly) office chairs. Try as we did, could not destroy those inexpensive vinyl chairs. In late 2017 the chairs were getting tired. Maybe we were also. We purchased on sale (2) La-Z-Boy leather computer chairs in January 2018 at $199.99. Thought they would last for many, many years. Hate to say the leather was so worn out when using these chairs max 2 hours per day in 4 1/2 years was very disheartning. What to do? Purchase 2 leather computer chairs however inexpensively. We came across these chairs however the reviews were terrible. What to do? Purchase them and if the reviewers are correct, send them back. Well the following may be of value to folks looking for good looking, easy to assemble, leather chairs. These may fit the need. About 75 minutes to assemble both chairs. The rolling of the chairs, we have plexiglass runners under the chairs over an area rug on wood floors, no problems rolling. Pistons no issues, chairs hold position. We are probably average heights and weights. She 5'9" 170 lbs, me 5'11" 205 lbs. Only issue may be the installation tool provided. Gets the job done however we dropped it at least a 1/2 dozen times. Lastly, we chose brown to match desks and file cabinets. Various colors available. So far these are a tad harder than the La-Z Boys however we think with our use they will probably outlast the La-Z-Boys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars One-star reviews are accurate
reviews.reviewText: One star-reviews are accurate. Not sure how I missed them before buying this poorly constructed chair. I think since I needed a replacement I only looked at the pictures of it. You do get what you pay for, its not a good chair. The assembly process was easy enough but the piston rod didn't function properly and when sitting in the chair it leaned to the right side. I thought maybe I put it together wrong. I double checked what I screwed in and everything was screwed in correct and tight and nothing was loose, but the chair was still leaning and when you moved around it creaked and felt like it was going to fall apart.The fake leather in the arm rests were thin and flimsy and seemed like they would burst at the seams. Overall it just felt cheaply made and poor quality. The back cushion of the chair was poking me between the shoulder blades and was just totally uncomfortable.When I requested to return it I couldn't get the defective piston rod to come loose from the base so I would need two boxes to return it. The seller said if the item wasn't damaged he would charge me $30 for the return. It was defective. There should be no charge. Since the base and piston were connected I needed a separate box. The seller never provided another shipping label for the second box when asked.I had to file an A-Z refund claim with Amazon to get my money back. Thank you Amazon. Based on all the other negative reviews, this chair should not be sold on Amazon. Probably the worst quality product I've ever bought. READ THE REVIEWS and decided for yourself. If the seller doesn't provide a second label to ship it back (or the option to take it to an Amazon return location), then I'm taking this to the trash dump where it belongs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A Disappointing Purchase
reviews.reviewText: My old office chair was literally falling apart so I needed a replacement. After reading reviews I decided on this one. My daughter is a large gal and I needed something that was a bit sturdier. This chair was advertised as being "heavy duty" and accommodating up to 400 lbs. I highly doubt someone 400 lbs. could use this chair and it far too narrow for a heavier person. I have had the chair for about a month and here are some of my thoughts:Pros: Stylish good looks: The leather is attractive and it looks like a much more expensive chair. Easy Assembly: It took me only a short time to assemble it and the instructions were easy to follow. Comfort: The seat and back are reasonably comfortable.Cons: The wheels are awful. They lock up and I end up just scooting the chair across the floor mat. It would be impossible to maneuver the chair on even the lowest pile carpeting. It does not recline to 110° in rocking mode as advertised. It is very tightly sprung and takes a lot of effort to tilt back. This may loosen up with time.In all fairness, I have not yet contacted the company regarding the wheels, but do plan to do so. It is too much of a pain to return the chair after having assembled it, so I plan to keep it, but if I had tried it in a store I would never have purchased it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for hubbys office.He said it was a bit of a pain to put together alone. He said with two people, it would have been much easier, but he managed to get it done.My hubby is a big guy, 6'2" 260lb. Hes very muscular, and solid. Office chairs usually don't hold up well for him.Although he's only had this one a bit over a month, he says it seems very durable and supportive.Its also comfortable.So at the price...you can not go wrong.He's happy with it, so am I.

reviews.reviewTitle: 最悪の買い物 絶対に買うな！！！ Amazonで椅子は買わない方が良い
reviews.reviewText: 最悪の買い物。絶対に買うな。その場限りの利益を求めて売っているだけ。この価格で１１万以上「フェイクレザーと書いているから騙される方が悪い」と５千円程度のビニール製の椅子を転売。こんな商品を紹介しているのだからAmazonも少し考えないと、これからは風向きが変わってくると思う。もう一度店頭の時代が来るかも。
